action.action-desc: Mr. Zeldin introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to adjust certain limits on the guaranteed amount of a home loan under the home loan program of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

section.header: Amount of loan guaranteed under home loan program of department of veterans affairs

subsection.text: Section 3703(a)(1) of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking the lesser of; and
by striking or 25 percent of the loan; and

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (C), by striking Freddie Mac and all that follows through the period and inserting amount of the loan..

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall apply with respect to a loan guaranteed under section 3710 of title 38, United States Code, on or after the date that is 30 days after the date of the enactment of this Act.
